languages.text: Торпеды могут наносить цели урон в полном объеме в результате прямого попадания, а также сниженный урон в радиусе 1 клетки при ручном подрыве или промахе (в этом случае детонация происходит от неконтактного взрывателя). Вероятность прямого попадания зависит от уклонения цели и способностей, позволяющих избегать попадания по ней. Атаки в результате детонации никогда не промахиваются, однако наносят сниженный урон.

Torpedoes deal full damage to targets on a direct hit or reduced damage in a 1-cell radius on a miss (detonating on a proximity fuse) or when detonated manually. The chance of a direct hit depends on the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} and any abilities the target might be using to avoid getting hit. Torpedo attacks made via detonation never miss but deal less damage compared to a direct hit.
languages.original_text: Торпеды могут наносить цели урон в полном объеме в результате прямого попадания, а также сниженный урон в радиусе 1 клетки при ручном подрыве или промахе (в этом случае детонация происходит от неконтактного взрывателя). Вероятность прямого попадания зависит от уклонения цели и способностей, позволяющих избегать попадания по ней. Атаки в результате детонации никогда не промахиваются, однако наносят сниженный урон.

traits.locale_text: Torpedoes deal full damage to targets on a direct hit or reduced damage in a 1-cell radius on a miss (detonating on a proximity fuse) or when detonated manually. The chance of a direct hit depends on the target's evasion and any abilities the target might be using to avoid getting hit. Torpedo attacks made via detonation never miss but deal less damage compared to a direct hit.

Torpedoes deal full damage to targets on a direct hit or reduced damage in a 1-cell radius on a miss (detonating on a proximity fuse) or when detonated manually. The chance of a direct hit depends on the target's evasion and any abilities the target might be using to avoid getting hit. Torpedo attacks made via detonation never miss but deal less damage compared to a direct hit.

Torpedoes deal full damage to targets on a direct hit or reduced damage in a 1-cell radius on a miss (detonating on a proximity fuse) or when detonated manually. The chance of a direct hit depends on the target's evasion and any abilities the target might be using to avoid getting hit. Torpedo attacks made via detonation never miss but deal less damage compared to a direct hit.

Torpedoes deal full damage to targets on a direct hit or reduced damage in a 1-cell radius on a miss (detonating on a proximity fuse) or when detonated manually. The chance of a direct hit depends on the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} and any abilities the target might be using to avoid getting hit. Torpedo attacks made via detonation never miss but deal less damage compared to a direct hit.

languages.text: Torpedos fügen Zielen bei direkten Treffern vollen Schaden zu. Wenn sie mit Hilfe eines Annäherungszünders oder manuell explodieren, fügen sie in einem 1-Feld-Radius reduzierten Schaden zu. Die Chance eines direkten Treffers hängt vom {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} des Ziels und sonstigen Fähigkeiten ab, sie es zur Vermeidung eines feindlichen Treffers einsetzen könnte. Torpedo-Angriffe per Detonation verfehlen ihr Ziel nie, fügen aber weniger Schaden als direkte Treffer zu.
languages.original_text: Torpedoes deal full damage to targets on a direct hit or reduced damage in a 1-cell radius on a miss (detonating on a proximity fuse) or when detonated manually. The chance of a direct hit depends on the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} and any abilities the target might be using to avoid getting hit. Torpedo attacks made via detonation never miss but deal less damage compared to a direct hit.

traits.locale_text: Torpedos fügen Zielen bei direkten {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffern{/g} vollen Schaden zu. Wenn sie mit Hilfe eines {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}Annäherungszünders{/g} oder manuell explodieren, fügen sie in einem 1-Feld-Radius reduzierten Schaden zu. Die Chance eines direkten Treffers hängt vom {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} des Ziels und sonstigen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} ab, sie es zur Vermeidung eines feindlichen Treffers einsetzen könnte. Torpedo-Angriffe per Detonation verfehlen ihr Ziel nie, fügen aber weniger Schaden als direkte Treffer zu.

languages.text: Les torpilles infligent un maximum de dégâts aux cibles en cas de coup direct ou des dégâts réduits dans un rayon d'une case en cas de tir manqué (explosant sur une fusée de proximité) ou lorsqu'elles sont déclenchées manuellement. Les chances de d'atteindre directement la cible dépendent de son {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g} et des capacités d'esquive dont elle dispose. Les attaques de torpilles lancées par détonation sont imparables mais infligent moins de dégâts qu'un coup direct.
languages.original_text: Torpedoes deal full damage to targets on a direct hit or reduced damage in a 1-cell radius on a miss (detonating on a proximity fuse) or when detonated manually. The chance of a direct hit depends on the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} and any abilities the target might be using to avoid getting hit. Torpedo attacks made via detonation never miss but deal less damage compared to a direct hit.

traits.locale_text: Les torpilles infligent un maximum de dégâts aux cibles en cas de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} direct ou des dégâts réduits dans un rayon d'une case en cas de tir manqué (explosant sur une {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}fusée de proximité{/g}) ou lorsqu'elles sont déclenchées manuellement. Les chances de d'atteindre directement la cible dépendent de son {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g} et des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} d'esquive dont elle dispose. Les attaques de torpilles lancées par détonation sont imparables mais infligent moins de dégâts qu'un coup direct.

languages.text: 鱼雷直接命中目标时会造成全额伤害，如果未能命中目标（通过近炸引信引爆）或手动引爆时，会对周围1格内的目标造成伤害。鱼雷直击击中目标的概率取决于目标的{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}，以及其他用来闪避攻击的相关能力。鱼雷引爆时，必定会命中范围内的目标，但与直接命中相比，造成的伤害会比较低。
languages.original_text: Torpedoes deal full damage to targets on a direct hit or reduced damage in a 1-cell radius on a miss (detonating on a proximity fuse) or when detonated manually. The chance of a direct hit depends on the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} and any abilities the target might be using to avoid getting hit. Torpedo attacks made via detonation never miss but deal less damage compared to a direct hit.

traits.locale_text: 鱼雷直接{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标时会造成全额伤害，如果未能命中目标（通过{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近炸引信{/g}引爆）或手动引爆时，会对周围1格内的目标造成伤害。鱼雷直击击中目标的概率取决于目标的{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}，以及其他用来闪避攻击的相关{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。鱼雷引爆时，必定会命中范围内的目标，但与直接命中相比，造成的伤害会比较低。

languages.original_text: Torpedoes deal full damage to targets on a direct hit or reduced damage in a 1-cell radius on a miss (detonating on a proximity fuse) or when detonated manually. The chance of a direct hit depends on the target's evasion and any abilities the target might be using to avoid getting hit. Torpedo attacks made via detonation never miss but deal less damage compared to a direct hit.

languages.text: Los torpedos infligen su daño completo a los objetivos con un impacto directo o daño reducido en un radio de 1 casilla al fallar (con un detonador de proximidad) o al detonarlos manualmente. La probabilidad de impacto directo depende de la {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}esquiva{/g} del objetivo y de las capacidades que utilice para evitar impactos. Los ataques de torpedo mediante detonación nunca fallan, pero infligen menos daño que los impactos directos.
languages.original_text: Torpedoes deal full damage to targets on a direct hit or reduced damage in a 1-cell radius on a miss (detonating on a proximity fuse) or when detonated manually. The chance of a direct hit depends on the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} and any abilities the target might be using to avoid getting hit. Torpedo attacks made via detonation never miss but deal less damage compared to a direct hit.

traits.locale_text: Los torpedos infligen su daño completo a los objetivos con un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} directo o daño reducido en un radio de 1 casilla al fallar (con un {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}detonador de proximidad{/g}) o al detonarlos manualmente. La probabilidad de impacto directo depende de la {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}esquiva{/g} del objetivo y de las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} que utilice para evitar impactos. Los ataques de torpedo mediante detonación nunca fallan, pero infligen menos daño que los impactos directos.

languages.text: 魚雷がターゲットに直撃すると敵に完全ダメージを与え、攻撃を外したり（近接信管による起爆）手動で起爆した場合はそれより少ないダメージを半径1セル以内に与える。直撃の確率はターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}およびターゲットが攻撃を回避するために使用しているアビリティにより異なる。起爆での魚雷攻撃は外れることはないが直撃に比べるとダメージは少ない。
languages.original_text: Torpedoes deal full damage to targets on a direct hit or reduced damage in a 1-cell radius on a miss (detonating on a proximity fuse) or when detonated manually. The chance of a direct hit depends on the target's {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} and any abilities the target might be using to avoid getting hit. Torpedo attacks made via detonation never miss but deal less damage compared to a direct hit.

traits.locale_text: 魚雷がターゲットに直{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}撃{/g}すると敵に完全ダメージを与え、攻撃を外したり（{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近接信管{/g}による起爆）手動で起爆した場合はそれより少ないダメージを半径1セル以内に与える。直撃の確率はターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}およびターゲットが攻撃を回避するために使用している{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}により異なる。起爆での魚雷攻撃は外れることはないが直撃に比べるとダメージは少ない。
